title: Sarah Mills
deck: I’m Sarah, I’m married to Mark and we have loved been part of Gateway Church since 2016. We have two grown up daughters Lucy and Alice. After a career in Finance and Administration, I have retired and enjoy growing fruit and vegetables in our garden, walking, riding my bike, and sewing. Mark and I also support children with disabilities in the York area as Short Break Foster Carers. As a Trustee of Gateway York CIO, I am able to share the skills and experience I gained as a Company Director and Employer with the Gateway Team.
